description:
Among a plethora of icons, one sneaks in that just doesn't match. Finding the odd one out within the time limit turns this into a fun brain activity that’s easy to get into.

How to play is simple:
・Take a good look at the image.
・Once you spot the anomaly, touch it before time runs out!

Even if a puzzle seems straightforward at a glance,
the ticking clock adds a surprising twist of difficulty!

Pair this game with its predecessors "Which One Is Different?" and "Find the Odd One!" for an even more brain-bending experience.

Stuck? Hit the hint button.
(We’ll nudge you in the right direction!)

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
name: Spot the Odd!
